member.name: T:MattJamesLibrary.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MattJamesLibrary.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.param: The host you intend to try and connect to (e.g. localhost, 127.0.0.1 etc..)

member.name: T:MattJamesLibrary.Networking.ISerializationProtocol
member.summary: This protocol allow methods that deserialize and serialize object to use the same language.

member.name: T:MattJamesLibrary.Networking.Server.TcpServer
member.summary: Creates a multithreaded TCP server with concurrent connections with clients.

The object you intend to send

member.name: M:MattJamesLibrary.Networking.Server.TcpServer.SendBroadcast(System.Net.IPEndPoint[],System.Object)
member.summary: Send a serializable object with Protocol to an array of connected sockets
member.param: An array of IPAddresses/Ports (IPEndPoints) from the connected sockets dictionary
The object you intend to send

member.name: M:MattJamesLibrary.Networking.Server.TcpServer.Close
member.summary: Close all connected sockets and close the main listening socket. ConnectedSockets will be cleared.
